# Paper Replication
In this section, we showcase some possible end-to-end projects that students may complete in order to gain experience with programming tools, and how to read papers. 

<hr> </hr>

Imitation is one of the highest forms flattery. Thus, to showcase the potential of this page, we will demo an economics paper replication. <br/>
Paper replication is an important exercise in making sure that the empirical methods used by researchers is robust, that is capable to be upheld under close scrutiny. <br/>
